Serialized Form

  • Package Client

    • Class Client.MainWindow extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • textSock

          Client.ClientTextSocket textSock
          Socket that manages text communication with the server .

        • textSend

          Client.TextSender textSend
          Container for text sending components.

        • textView

          TextViewer textView
          Container for text viewing components.

    • Class Client.TextSender extends java.awt.Container implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • textFieldWeight

          double textFieldWeight
          The weight given to the text field inside the GridBagLayout.

        • textSock

          Client.ClientTextSocket textSock
          The ClientTextSocket to pass messages to for sending a message to the server.

        • textArea

          javax.swing.JTextField textArea
          TextField to type messages in.

        • send

          javax.swing.JButton send
          Button for sending messages. The text inside the TextSender.textArea is sent when this is pressed.

    • Class Client.TextViewer extends javax.swing.JScrollPane implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • textArea

          javax.swing.JTextArea textArea
          The text area that messages received from the server are written to.
